scenario_text.value: Hey, Aoi...
Hm? What is it?
Well, uh...
(What should I say to Aoi?)
You and Labramon good?
You hungry?
Thank you.
You and Labramon good?

How are you and Labramon? Everything okay
with you two?
Yes, everything’s fine. Why do you ask?
That’s right! Aoi and I are reeeal close!
Hee hee... We sure are.
Oh. That’s good.
Yeah...
Listen, Takuma, I know what’s bothering you.

If we do go back to our world, we’ll have to
leave our partners behind.
But despite that, we have to fight.
Yeah, you’re right...
You hungry?
Are you hungry, Aoi?
What? You want to stop and eat already?

This wouldn’t happen if you had enough
before. Honestly, I don’t know what to say!
Oh, no, I didn’t ask because I was...

Haha, never mind! I’d love to have some more
of your cooking.

You would, huh? Heheh, then you’d better do
your best, so we can bring an end to this.
Listen, Aoi... Thanks...for everything.
Thank you.
What? Where’s this coming from?

But listen, I feel like I should thank you
too, for everything.

I’m older than you and Minoru, so I felt like
I needed to do my best to be strong for you.

But it turns out you’re a lot stronger and
more reliable than me.

You’ve helped me out so much. Helped
encourage me, and given me the strength to go on.
Aoi...
Don’t worry, Takuma. I am ready for this now.

It looks like some of the others are still
worried, though. You should talk with them.

You’ve always been like a pillar of strength
for us, Takuma. The others need your support.
Got it, Aoi. I’ll go talk with them.

The others need your support too, Takuma. You
should go talk to them.
